conversation_log.user_message: Nice! What are you up to today?
conversation_log.valor_response: Just diving into my morning tasks - I'm tackling some updates to our evaluation system. Got a couple high-priority items on my plate, mainly fixing some wording in our individual evaluation questions and implementing a new alert feature for health professionals. Pretty typical Thursday - lots of interesting challenges to solve! Been sipping my coffee while reviewing the test coverage for these changes.
